CIRCULAR  NO.   37 /  2002 
 
 
 
In continuation to this Bureau Circular No. 26/2002 dated 24.09.2002, the 
personal security Officers (PSOs) of Shri. L.K.Advani, Dy. Prime Minister of India 
are permitted to carry their weapons and ammunition on their persons or in their 
hand baggage on board the flights.  The weapons will be carried in fully unloaded 
condition i.e. weapons and ammunition shall be kept separately while 
accompanying the dignitary on board the aircraft. 
 
The above instructions shall be implemented by all concerned with 
immediate effect. 
 
 
(R.K. Singh) 
Addl   Commissioner  of  Security (CA) 
 
Ref. No. CAS-7 (9)/84-DIV-1     dated 13.12.2002
